name: Sopa de Lima
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, weekday, soups and stews
keywords: appetizer, main course, chicken broth, cooked chicken breast, lard, lime, poultry, tomato, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 pound tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped (if fresh tomatoes are unsatisfactory, use imported canned whole tomatoes)
1 pound chicken breasts, poached and shredded

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan melt lard or butter. Add onion, and cook until translucent. Do not brown. Add tomatoes, and cook over high flame for about 3 minutes. Stir in the green peppers and chicken broth. Simmer about 10 minutes. Add lime slices, and let simmer for 5 more minutes. Add salt to taste.
Place some tortilla chips in each bowl; add equal parts of the shredded chicken. Pour hot soup over everything.
Serve garnished with chopped onions, ground hot chilis and chopped lime.
